articles.title: Measles outbreak: Your questions answered - BBC.com
articles.description: People are encouraged to have the MMR jab, as cases of measles are rising across England.
articles.content:
By Andy GiddingsBBC News, West Midlands
Cases of measles have been rising across England, with the latest outbreaks centred in the West Midlands and London. 
Health officials are encouraging people… [+5972 chars]
